news.title: Three dead and one injured as helicopter crashes during training flight
news.summary: Four people were on board the helicopter when it crashed on the Isle of Wight, police say.

news.title: Hospitality hit by half of all UK job losses since Budget, industry leaders warn
news.summary: Lobby group calls for urgent action to lower taxes, but the government says it is helping establishments.

news.title: Man mistakenly deported to El Salvador set to be removed from US again
news.summary: Kilmar Abrego Garcia is taken into custody in Baltimore as his lawyers say he may be sent to Uganda.

news.title: Bank holiday delivers record temperatures for parts of UK
news.summary: The heat will be short-lived, with wet and windy weather expected for most by mid week.

news.title: Scotland is known for its rain. So why are experts worried about water supplies?
news.summary: Restrictions are being introduced on water use by businesses near two rivers where the levels are low.

news.title: Colourful Notting Hill Carnival revellers party in the streets
news.summary: The celebrations continue with the adult's parade, sound systems and live performances on Monday.

news.title: Kneecap cancel US tour dates amid court case
news.summary: The trio said they have cancelled all upcoming US tour dates because of the "proximity of our next court hearing in London".

news.title: Virginia Giuffre memoir to be published months after death
news.summary: She had finished working on the "intimate" and "heartbreaking" book before she took her own life in April, her publisher says.

news.title: Get ready for fracking, Reform UK tells energy firms
news.summary: The party is serious about going after shale gas - but critics argue it's too difficult and costly.

news.title: Lives torn apart by fatal crashes on one of UK's longest roads
news.summary: The family of an American woman who died in a crash on the A9 with her brother and mother talk about the impact.
